Author: Stephanie Charitonenko, Ismah Afwan
Creator: PageMaker 6.5
Keywords: commercialization, microfinance, indonesia, ino, microfinance commercialization, microcredit programs, mfis
Subject: This study is the fourth of a series of publications resulting from a regional technical assistance project on commercialization of microfinance. The series comprises four country reports (on Bangladesh, Indonesia, Philippines, and Sri Lanka) and a regional report on perspectives on commercialization from South and Southeast Asia.
Title: Commercialization of Microfinance: Indonesia
